prompts.prompt:
Create a square social media ad for a mortgage comparison platform targeting real estate investors.

The scene: A commanding control tower made of matte teal clay (#46be8a), rising from the center of the composition. From its peak, 350 thin threads radiate outward like a network—each thread a different lender connection, rendered in subtle warm terracotta and cream tones. The tower has satisfying finger-pressed texture, handmade imperfections that make it feel crafted, not manufactured.

The background is deep navy (#011a40) with a thick 10-pixel teal border framing the composition. The contrast is intentional—dark corporate world, bright solution cutting through.

Generous negative space on the left holds bold stacked typography: "350+ LENDERS" in warm cream, followed by "60 SECONDS" below it. At the bottom, smaller supporting text: "One search. All options." in the same teal as the tower.

The mood is confident efficiency—not overwhelming choice, but curated power. Like having a command center for the entire lending market.

Aspect ratio 1:1, high resolution for Meta feed placement.

Create a square social media ad for a mortgage broker targeting borrowers who've been rejected by traditional banks.

The scene: Three small "X" marks carved into matte gray clay on the left—representing past rejections. To the right, a large checkmark made of glossy teal clay (#46be8a) rises triumphantly, catching soft light from above. The checkmark has visible fingerprint impressions, soft rounded edges, real dimensionality. Between the X's and the checkmark, a subtle 48-hour clock face pressed into the surface.

The entire scene sits on a warm cream base. A thick, confident navy (#011a40) border frames everything—neo-brutalist but warm. Shadows are soft, grounding each element in space.

Typography in the upper negative space: "REJECTED 3 TIMES" in muted charcoal, crossed out with a single terracotta line. Below it, "APPROVED IN 48 HOURS" in bold teal. Supporting text at bottom: "We see the full picture." in navy.

The feeling is vindication and relief—not desperation, but the exhale after yes.

Aspect ratio 1:1, high resolution for Meta feed placement.

Create a square social media ad for a mortgage platform targeting time-sensitive real estate investors.

The scene: A clay hourglass in the center, but the sand is flowing upward—time being reclaimed. The top chamber is empty terracotta clay, the bottom overflows with teal sand (#46be8a). The hourglass frame is deep navy clay (#011a40) with that satisfying handmade weight and finger-pressed texture.

Behind the hourglass, 856 tiny clay figures in warm cream march toward it from the edges—borrowers who found their rate. The composition has the urgency of movement without chaos.

Thick teal border, 10 pixels, framing everything with intention. Warm cream background lets the scene breathe.

Bold typography positioned top-left: "856 BORROWERS" in navy. Below: "found their rate this month." in smaller teal. Bottom of composition: "You're still shopping." in muted terracotta—a gentle challenge.

The mood is motivated FOMO—not panic, but the realization that others are moving while you wait.

Aspect ratio 1:1, high resolution for Meta feed placement.

Create a square social media ad for a mortgage comparison service targeting savvy real estate investors.

The scene: A large clay door, slightly ajar, made of matte navy (#011a40). Warm golden light spills through the gap—the hidden market revealed. Through the opening, glimpses of 350 smaller doors in various warm tones (terracotta, sage, coral) stretching into depth. The main door has a teal (#46be8a) handle with visible clay fingerprints.

The composition is off-center—door on the right, generous breathing room on the left for typography. Thick terracotta border, 10 pixels, frames the scene. Cream background with soft shadows grounding the door.

Typography stacked on the left: "WHAT 350+ LENDERS KNOW" in bold navy. Below, smaller: "that your bank won't tell you." in teal. The text has architectural presence.

The feeling is exclusive access—like being let in on a secret the financial establishment keeps hidden. Curiosity, not conspiracy.

Aspect ratio 1:1, high resolution for Meta feed placement.

Create a square social media ad for a mortgage broker specializing in self-employed borrowers.

The scene: A clay briefcase in the center, open and overflowing with unconventional items—a laptop, multiple revenue streams represented by different colored clay coins, invoices, contracts folding out like origami. The briefcase is teal clay (#46be8a) with satisfying finger-pressed texture. The items spilling out are warm terracotta, cream, and sage—representing complex, non-traditional income.

Above the briefcase, a simple clay checkmark in navy (#011a40) hovers—approval despite complexity.

Thick navy border frames the warm cream background. Soft shadows create depth. The scene is busy but organized—complexity that makes sense.

Typography in upper left corner: "SELF-EMPLOYED?" in bold terracotta, like a direct callout. Below: "Banks don't get your income. We do." in navy. The tone is recognition, not judgment.

The mood is validation—finally being seen and understood by a lender who speaks your financial language.

Aspect ratio 1:1, high resolution for Meta feed placement.

Create a square social media ad for a fast-closing mortgage service targeting real estate investors.

The scene: Two race tracks side by side, made of clay. The left track is long, winding, gray—a tiny clay building crawling along it (the bank, labeled "3 WEEKS" in pressed clay letters). The right track is short, direct, teal (#46be8a)—a larger clay building already at the finish line, labeled "48 HOURS."

Both tracks lead to the same clay house at the top—a warm terracotta home representing the property. The contrast is stark: same destination, radically different journeys.

Thick navy (#011a40) border frames the cream background. The clay has visible handmade texture—fingerprints, soft edges, matte finish with subtle highlights.

Typography at the bottom: "SAME PROPERTY." in bold navy, centered. "Different timeline." in teal below. The message is clear without being preachy.

The mood is competitive advantage—the satisfaction of moving faster than the system designed to slow you down.

Aspect ratio 1:1, high resolution for Meta feed placement.
